com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.api

com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.helpers
 
  • Classes in com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.helpers used by com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.api
    Class
    Description
    MiniGameCustomOption.Option
     
    MiniGameEventDetector
    Event detector to send Minigames

    [IMPORTANT]
    Detectable event means can get player from "Default event list" or "Detailed event list"

    [Default Event List]
    - PlayerEvent
    - EntityEvent
    - HangingEvent
    - InventoryEvent
    - InventoryMoveItemEvent
    - PlayerLeashEntityEvent
    - TabCompleteEvent

    [Detailed Event list]
    - Some of BlockEvent
    - Some of EntityEvent
    - Some of VehicleEvent
    MiniGamePlayerData
    Player data with score, live
    [IMPORTANT] live is only valid in the minigame play (not related with player's health)
    [IMPORTANT] Player state saved when a instance is created (in constructor)
    MiniGameRankResult
    Interface for rank data

    Class
    Description
    MiniGameCustomOption
    Below custom options are created in `custom-data` section by default
    Must serialize/deserialize value of each options in get(), set() method
    MiniGameDataManager
     
    MiniGamePlayerData
    Player data with score, live
    [IMPORTANT] live is only valid in the minigame play (not related with player's health)
    [IMPORTANT] Player state saved when a instance is created (in constructor)
    MiniGameRankResult
    Interface for rank data
    MiniGameSetting
    If create option
    - Add getter and setter

    Also if file control is true
    - Add option in MiniGameSetting.getFileSetting() and MiniGameSetting.setFileSetting(Map)
    - Add access method to MiniGameMinigamesConfigCommand
    MiniGameViewManager

    Class
    Description
    MiniGameCustomOption.Option
     
    MiniGamePlayerState
    Manage player's everything
    - When join the game: save state and make pure state
    - When quit the game: restore saved state
    [IMPORATNT]
    - If add a element, check that affects to viewer MiniGameViewManager
    MiniGameRankResult
    Interface for rank data
    MiniGameSetting.GameFinishCondition
    Check game finish condition
